item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 6, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Paper Apps (234 points | 53 comments)

14. Memfault (YC W19) Is Hiring an Android System (AOSP) Engineer ( | hide)

24. The Language Construction Kit (1996, 2012) (96 points | 12 comments)
25. I wrote a screenplay for a programming language introduction (47 points | 6 comments)
26. Avoiding outrage fatigue while staying informed (660 points | 747 comments)
27. The missing cross-platform OS API for timers (20 points | 17 comments)
28. Software development topics I've changed my mind on (786 points | 722 comments)
29. GNU Make Standard Library (146 points | 69 comments)
